titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-03-29T18:42-0400

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: David Weiner (b. ca. 1912) was a member of the Teachers Union of New York, and subsequently, the United Federation of Teachers, where he was a member of the left-wing opposition group the Teachers Action Caucus. Weiner also was active in the retired teachers chapter of the UFT, and at one time edited its newsletter.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material at the Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
relatedmaterial.p: Teachers Action Caucus (United Federation of Teachers) (TAM 141)
United Action Caucus (American Federation of Teachers) (TAM 338)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This unprocessed collection contains material related to the UFT and its retired teachers chapter, the Teachers Action Caucus, and public education-related topics. PLEASE DIRECT FURTHER INQUIRIES TO: peter.filardo@nyu.edu
